evilpauze.welcome_message: Please take five minutes to read over <#814865122639740948>, <#814865357110116389> and <#856560182753361970>, then reply in this channel with `verify me` to enter the server!\n\nIf you are having issues with the verification process, please contact a staff member in DMs so we can verify you manually.
evilpauze.cooldown_message: We consider five minutes to be the minimum time you need to properly acknowledge the information channel and the server rules.
